titleInfo.title: University of Denver CAMPMAP GIS Project

mods.abstract: This document is presented as a plan for hte implementation of a Geotechnical project that will fulfill the requirements for course credit in GEOG 4960, Project Identification. Course credit in GEOG 4960 is a requirement for completion of a Masters of Arts in Geography at the University of Denver. The Facilities Management Department at the University of Denver has been chosen as the client for whome this plan is written. The actual implementation of the project will fulfill the requirements for GEOG 4993, Technical Project. A committee of individuals representing both the Department of Geography and Facilities Management has been chosen to review this document. Approval of this plan by this committee is required before the implementation phase can proceed. This plan outlines the steps that are to be taken and the resources that are required to complete the project. Background information is also provided.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
